column2: It has been about a century since the Eastern realms have been tied to France and we have stayed together despite centrifugal revolutionary forces. It is now time to welcome our sister countries as full French territories and consolidate our position in Europe.

The Beyliks have long stood as independent representatives of the central government but they are now anachronistic relics of a bygone age. It is time to form a strong united $COUNTRY$ and take direct control over these lands.

It has been about a century since the Hungary has been tied to Lithuania and we have stayed together despite centrifugal revolutionary forces. It is now time to welcome our sister country as a full Lithuanian territory and consolidate our position in Europe.

Denmark was welcomed in the Norwegian fold during the Revolutionary Wars at the end of the 1700s. In this new era of nationalism, it is time to once more bring our brothers into the fold and form a stronger whole.

Silesia has been a faithful companion to Bohemia since the beginning of the 1800s. In this new dangerous era of world-spanning conflicts, it is time that we collaborate more closely with Silesia and their people.
